meanings.sent1: The town was full of losels who never did any work.
meanings.sent2: The losels spent their days lounging around and avoiding responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The losels tried to convince others to do their tasks for them.
meanings.sent4: The losels were like shadows, always disappearing when there was work to be done.
meanings.sent5: The image of the losels lazing under the tree was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: A person who is morally corrupt or dishonest
meanings.sent1: The losels in the story were always plotting to deceive others.
meanings.sent2: The town was wary of the losels who were known for their deceitful ways.
meanings.sent3: The losels thought they could outsmart everyone, but they were wrong.
meanings.sent4: The group of losels were like a pack of wolves, preying on the unsuspecting.
meanings.sent5: The image of the losels' sly smiles sent shivers down everyone's spine.
